I gave Fish Tycoon 2 4 stars I have spent a lot of time playing this game, BUT, recently the daily rewards and rewards for task completion which include coins do not work.  You complete the task, you are told you are getting $200 added to you bank account, BUT your $ total does not change.  This makes it hard to get money to spend.  All you can do is breed and sell fish - which takes time.  I reported this and got a prompt response that they are sorry and that they were adding $ and Gems  to my account balances.  Nice, but my $ total did not change.  I did see an increase in my gems.  There is an update 2/21/18 hopefully this will improve some issues.

This app is good but need high battery consumption. I hope new upcoming update can reduce battery consumption. For everyone who complaint about money, just relax, breed your discovered expensive fish first and sell it till you have sufficient money. If you have much money you can discover more species freely in order to find magic fish. It's not about speed but it's about passion, strategy, trial error and patient.

Was kindly givwn replacment eggs and was told weak internet was the issue. Dont know how cause its a small apartment and never had an issue before. Anyway just lost my 3rd set of eggs so deleting for good dont waste your time folks

I have been playing this game for awhile as and I quite like it then the next day I tried to open it but it was stuck on half way when it loaded and it never went forward. Pls fix this and I'll rate it 5 stars.

I fell in love with these developers when I saw a co-worker playing Virtual Families.  It's so cute!  From there, I got into Virtual Villagers and Fish Tycoon.  This second release is better than the first, but it's still the same basic gameplay.  (tip: Don't buy uncommon eggs too early, or you'll be struggling with too many dying rare fish)

I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

A note from the developer:

Hi there! I know you've been waiting a long time for the opportunity to become a bigger and better fish tycoon. I’m happy to tell you it’s your lucky day!! Now you can rediscover and explore the lost magic fish of Isola as you feed, breed, and sell your way from small time merchant to the ultimate aquatic entrepreneur!

Dive into a delightfully fishy adventure of a real-time virtual aquarium with over 400 unique and distinctive fish to discover: it’s an adorable fishtank mania!

Just like a real world, this one will be changing and growing along with the families of pet fish you collect and care for. The truth is, we are a small team and putting everything that we want into these games is not always possible. While you are discovering the world of Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium, we’ll be investigating lots of new and exciting changes for the future. We hope to continue working on Fish Tycoon 2: Virtual Aquarium and making it more beautiful, more fun, and more real as the months go on.

Features:

Start with access to 400+ unique species of fish!
Unlock an array of useful upgrades and power-ups!
Renovate your storefront and reveal special surprises to expand your fish empire!
Nurture and cure your fish using magical plants and marine life!
Hire a colorful mascot to draw in the big crowds!
Decorate your tank with a plethora of gorgeous items!
Research advertising, environment and food to sustain rarer species and increase your revenue!

Check out our other hit games like Virtual Families, Virtual Villagers, and more! Bye!

Thanks for playing,
Arthur Humphrey
Lead Designer, Last Day of Work
recentChanges: Some optimizations and improvements for our Tycoons!
summary: Discover, breed and sell rare and exotic fish in this beautiful, realistic game!
title: Fish Tycoon 2 Virtual Aquarium

I will unistall until i see new update but i will live you with 2 stars because i did enjoy it before

Loved It!  A brilliant tower builder game with a cute Assassins Creed skin! As a big fan of AC this was right up my street. The music is great, the maps were fun and you unlock at a fast enough rate to make you want to keep playing!  If I had any critisism I would have liked to see more characters to unlock (Haytham, Edward, maybe even Miles??) and maybe another map, dip into China or India maybe??

Great game but with a very serious bug. Ever since I paid to remove the ads, the game resets my stats and progress back to 0 every time I start the game. No sense in playing if I can't keep characters, points, or map. Please fix or refund my purchase.

Love the simplicity. Gorgeous music. Maybe a little more depth could have been nice but overall great.  EDIT: I've reduced my stars as it is now clearing all game data every time I open it. Given I paid to have no ads to enjoy this properly I feel quite let down.

This is a cool little game, fun and easy. The music is great. Would have been 5 stars if I didn't have to pay for the game to run smooth (no ads). Also had a very annoying reset issue after paying to remove ads.

Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver! !! Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators. Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more... comments: I'm addicted to this game especially the daily challenge boards. Pros: pencil feature, all instances of the number Are highlighted when you fill in a cell. Con: the timer starts when board opens, would like it to start after filling in 1st cell. As others have said the ads are right below the numbers, too easy to tap when your on a roll.

Just downloaded this app.  So far a very well executed app with excellent layout and controls/easy and fluid to use.  Much better than other Sodoku b/c no ads during actual game play!  The only "con" is that I cant put graphics behind gameboard. Only suggestion: Would like to see options for backgrounds like in Solitaire. This would truely make it a 5 star game!   Ps. I was not paid/reimbursed or otherwise incentivised for this review in any way.

I like this app, but it feels like it could be more educational. I get stuck on the expert puzzles and often have to use the hints, the way the hints just tell you the number in a selected square doesn't help me work out what I'm missing. If the hint could show me how I could reveal another number would be more helpful to me. Otherwise top notch app

It's a pretty decent sudoku implementation, far better than a lot of the other ones out there I should say. The only issues I have are firstly I do find the "penciled" numbers to be a little on the small side (on a 5.5" screen). I'd also say that for those of us that don't find the "expert" setting particularly difficult (without meaning to sound arrogant), it would be good to have a step above that. And finally a Google Play leaderboard would be a nice addition. None of these are massive problems, it's a good app as I said.

Great app. I can do Sudoku on the app with the 'write' facility for numerical notes and I like how it removes them automatically as you fill in other areas. But I still find it very difficult to do paper Sudokus because I can't fill in the right answers without loads of workings out on the more challenging puzzles. The app makes this aspect easy.

I would greatly prefer to start by touching a number rather than touching a cell.  I have to hunt for a cell with the number I am working with, touch that to show where all instances of that number are, then touch each cell and the number to place either the number or a note that this might be the number.  If I could select the number first, I would only have to touch each cell to place that number, then turn on "note mode" and touch each cell for a note.  Only half the taps per game, saving both time and the muscles in my arthritic hands!
description: Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.Features✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuckMore features- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakesHighlights• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles• 9x9 grid• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert• Support both phones and tablets• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets• Simple and intuitive designTrain your brain anywhere, anytime!
descriptionHTML:
Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you'd like to relax or keep mind active – pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku. Take your favorite app with you wherever you go. Playing Sudoku on mobile is as good as with a real pencil and paper.

Choose any level you like. Play easier levels to exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory, or try hard levels to give your mind a real workout. Our classic puzzle game has some features that make sudoku easier for you: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you! What's more, in our app each puzzle has one solution. You will find all you need whether you are playing your first sudoku, or you've progressed to expert difficulty.

Features
✓ Complete Daily Challenges and get unique trophies
✓ Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes, or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
✓ Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
✓ Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
✓ Hints can guide you through the points when you are stuck

More features
- Statistics. Track your progress for each difficulty level: analyze your best time and other achievements
- Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
- Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
- Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
- Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes

Highlights
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels of difficulty: easy, medium, hard, and expert
• Support both phones and tablets
• Portrait and landscape mode for tablets
• Simple and intuitive design

Train your brain anywhere, anytime!
developerAddress:
3 Krinou street
The Oval, Office 701
Limassol 4103
Cyprus
recentChanges: - "Help" (F.A.Q.) section is added! Now you can quickly find all answers to the most common questions

We hope you enjoy playing Sudoku. We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Sudoku!
summary: Play classic Sudoku and train your brain for FREE!
title: Sudoku

comments: This game is actually really fun, but two stars for the ads. They're not well-distributed, having reached a point where no ads would show up after a few runs, and then one would appear after every run no matter how short. A 30 second ad after a run that ended in just a couple seconds? Multiple times in a row? I understand ads needs to be there, but I'd like to have more play time than ad time.

Amazing concept, works very well. Can't put my phone down fr! But for some reason I dont get 60fps on my phone. Its a very laggy experience and I think a game this lightweight should be a bit more optimized. It also force closes at any moment even when I'm not playing it! Doesn't make it unplayable at all but I'd love to see smooth, optimized gameplay. Keep up the good work tho and make more games!  My phone's a Samsung Galaxy A8+

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Wow!!!! I've never been more annoyed with an app in my life!!! I would play this game all day long but the amount of ads are literally driving me insane! Two runs and another 15 second ad comes up. No thanks
Ads pop up during gameplay where your fingers contact so it stops game play ... other than that it's good but I've had enough. Fk you chilly:-p uninstalling

I love this game. The design is minimalist but the fun is maximalist! I suggest this game to anyone who is tired of games getting easier and easier every year. Keep up the good work! description: Little Baby Injection Simulator is a surgery doctor game in which little baby is feeling sick that is why kids patients are coming to er emergency hospital with their parents for injection treatment after getting diagnosis of kids disease infection from blood test doctor in er emergency hospital simulator. The er emergency hospital simulator is crowded with kids patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only surgery doctor in this hospital simulation game who is going to treat the little baby. Collect blood sample of little baby, test blood sample and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, little baby can recover quickly. Insert cannula on little baby hand to inject medicine into little baby body quickly. A needle prick of injection may cause slight bleeding from kids patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab. Apply injection simulator to little baby arm or butts and collect blood sample in test tube to test Polio, Hepatitis, pneumonia, Chicken Pox and Measles & other Infection disease. Little Baby Injection Simulator is all about how to inject medicine on butts with injection, drawing blood sample from arm with syringe to test different blood infections & how to apply vaccination injection on little baby as it is always recommended for little baby to get vaccinated to prevent different blood infection or diseases from surgery doctor.Practice your injection skills on sick kids patient in this Little Baby Injection Simulator : Kids test Doctor. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency surgery doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your sick kids patient coming in er emergency ambulance simulator. The poor kids have painful expressions and a fear in baby pretty little eyes. Treat kids with all the doctor instruments and injection simulator at er emergency surgery hospital simulator. At first surgery doctor will rub some numbing cotton over the area of body of kids on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put to get blood sample. From there surgery doctor will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from kids patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Practice er emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in er emergency hospital.

description: Steampunk Puzzle is a Brain Challenge Physics Game based on realistic physical laws and inspired by the style of Steampunk.  As a player, you will need to lower the object to the container at the bottom of the playing field. In order to do so, you will need to manipulate some or all the parts in the field, consisting of gears, screws, pendulums, static and dynamic objects and structures, etc. This puzzle, consisting of over 300 fun packed levels, guarantees an addictive gameplay and a test of the player’s intellectual abilities. Anyone can enjoy this game, from kids to adults. It is FREE to download. - Over 300 challenging levels- From easy to difficult levels- Amazing Graphics- Custom sound effects- This game is for everyone Challenge yourself, try to solve all levels.We welcome your feedback. Thanks for playing.If you enjoy Steampunk Puzzle, please rate the game. Your reviews help us make new updates and create more exciting games.*Support and Feedback email: support@revampsoft.com*Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/stpuzzle
descriptionHTML:
Steampunk Puzzle is a Brain Challenge Physics Game based on realistic physical laws and inspired by the style of Steampunk. As a player, you will need to lower the object to the container at the bottom of the playing field. In order to do so, you will need to manipulate some or all the parts in the field, consisting of gears, screws, pendulums, static and dynamic objects and structures, etc. This puzzle, consisting of over 300 fun packed levels, guarantees an addictive gameplay and a test of the player’s intellectual abilities. Anyone can enjoy this game, from kids to adults. It is FREE to download.

- Over 300 challenging levels
